attributes.action: To sack all MPs who are fiddling tax payers and make them accountable for all expenses not just the ones over £250.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I find it very odd the 
that Mr. Conway has not been sacked as an MP.

A private citizen would have been arrested already for stealing and this is what it is.   No matter how he tries to dress it up.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
